description:
You see a bunch of the following in Nova's test runs:

Captured stderr:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    /home/jaypipes/repos/nova/.tox/py27/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_db/sqlalchemy/enginefacade.py:254: OsloDBDeprecationWarning: EngineFacade is deprecated; please use oslo_db.sqlalchemy.enginefacade
      self._legacy_facade = LegacyEngineFacade(None, _factory=self)

We should use oslo_db.sqlalchemy.enginefacade now in all cases.
title: Clean up warnings about enginefacade

comments.content:
You see a bunch of the following in Nova's test runs:

Captured stderr:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    /home/jaypipes/repos/nova/.tox/py27/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_db/sqlalchemy/enginefacade.py:254: OsloDBDeprecationWarning: EngineFacade is deprecated; please use oslo_db.sqlalchemy.enginefacade
      self._legacy_facade = LegacyEngineFacade(None, _factory=self)

We should use oslo_db.sqlalchemy.enginefacade now in all cases.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content: Changing status back to confirmed. Will see what I can do!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ja224e

comments.content: Jeffrey Augustine Can you please let me know if you are still working in this bug ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~siva-radhakrishnan

comments.content: Sorry for the delay! Just returning from the summit and should now have time. If no update by the end of week I will release it to you.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ja224e

comments.content: changing it to confirmed to avoid any confusion on the status of the bug
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~siva-radhakrishnan

comments.content: I don't see in happening in py27 anymore but I could see single occurrence of it in tox -e py34.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~siva-radhakrishnan

comments.content: I can't reproduce the problem neither with py27 nor py34: it seems like oslo_db.sqlalchemy.enginefacade is being used everywhere already.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dinobot

comments.content:
As we use the "direct-release" model in Nova we don't use the
"Fix Comitted" status for merged bug fixes anymore. I'm setting
this manually to "Fix Released" to be consistent.

[1] "[openstack-dev] [release][all] bugs will now close automatically
    when patches merge"; Doug Hellmann; 2015-12-07;
    http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2015-December/081612.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
